body.$invariant:
We collect and use your personal information for the Permitted Purpose and in accordance with our privacy policy.
 
In collecting and using your personal information for the Permitted Purpose, we may disclose your personal information to Third Parties.  If we disclose your personal information to Third Parties, we ensure those Third Parties only use your personal information for the Permitted Purpose and in accordance with our privacy policy.
 
If we don’t collect your personal information, we’re unable to respond to your request.
 
If you wish to access or correct your personal information, please contact our Privacy Officer.
